name: Varuuuu❤️
greetingText: It is such a blessing to have a friend like you my love
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy returns of the day
text2: I was going to do something else

outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
